thread.title: Creating the Girl Who Stared Down the Wall Street Bull
thread.title_full: Creating the Girl Who Stared Down the Wall Street Bull

title: Creating the Girl Who Stared Down the Wall Street Bull
text:
MoneyBeat Creating the Girl Who Stared Down the Wall Street Bull How artist Kristen Visbal created the bronze statue of a young girl that was placed in front of the iconic Wall Street bull By Sarah Krouse Mar 7, 2017 8:33 am ET 
How do you stare down a Wall Street bull? That’s the question sculptor Kristen Visbal faced in creating a new statue of a young girl squaring up to the iconic Charging Bull statue in downtown New York. Ms. Visbal was hired as part of an effort by Global Advisors to push companies to place more […]
